definition: bitterness finishes, sweetness begins (idiom); the hard times are over, the good times just beginning
bitter/hardship/pain/to suffer/to bring suffering to/painstakingly
to use up/to exhaust/to end/to finish/to the utmost/exhausted/finished/to the limit (of sth)/all/entirely
to the greatest extent/(when used before a noun of location) furthest or extreme/to be within the limits of/to give priority to
surname Gan/abbr. for Gansu Province 甘肅省|甘肃省[Gan1 su4 Sheng3]
sweet/willing
to come/to arrive/to come round/ever since/next

sentences.english: He prayed for his friends and turned things around, enjoyed happiness after long suffering.
sentences.chinese: 为朋友祈祷，成为转捩点，苦尽甘来。

sentences.english: Sweet are the uses of adversity.
; You have had the bitter, now comes the sweet.
Please believe a son, believe we will be luck turns after hardship.
sentences.chinese: 请您相信儿子，相信我们会苦尽甘来。

sentences.english: After years of hard work, Mr. Jones is finally living on easy street.
sentences.chinese: 辛勤工作好几年后，琼斯先生终于可以苦尽甘来了。

sentences.english: It was also said that today's pain is for tomorrow's harvest, Gujinganlai just.
sentences.chinese: 也有人说今天的痛苦是为了明天的丰收，苦尽甘来嘛。

sentences.english: Love a person, is the sunshine.
sentences.chinese: 爱一个人，是苦尽甘来的。

sentences.english: Tough times never last but tough people do.
sentences.chinese: 艰苦的时光终将过去，坚强的人必将苦尽甘来。

definition: the time comes, fortune turns (idiom); to have a lucky break/things change for the better
to break clear of all the troubles and hardships/to achieve success/to make it
lit. the salted fish turns over (idiom)/fig. to experience a reversal of fortune
the road to happiness is strewn with setbacks (idiom)
hard times
extreme sorrow turns to joy (idiom)
lit. the divine steed Feihuang gallops (idiom)/fig. to achieve meteoric success in one's career
a torment/a trial/tribulation/a cross (to bear)/well-tried
to live comfortably/happy and prosperous life
to win success and recognition (idiom)
flushed with success/proud of one's success (in exams, promotion etc)/as pleased as punch
good luck
both fame and fortune (idiom)/both virtue and reward
two simultaneous happy events in the family
a dream come true
twists and turns
